column4: I'm trying to find the line to add to my apt sources to be able to install java-package - anyone know?
Okay, I have to ask - why is the mysql-server-4.1 deb dependent on postfix?
it isn't for me. mailx is there but not postfix
apt-cache depends mysql-server-4.1 show only mailx (edgy)
interesting - I just dove into a apt-get install mysql-server-4.1, and low and behold - postfix!
are you using the ubuntu repos?
Not sure, to be honest - how do I find out?
carl@home:~$ apt-cache show mysql-server-4.1 | grep name
same. why do we have different dependencies? it isn't another package you're installing that demands it?
I just typed "sudo apt-get install mysql-server-4.1" ...
Thanks for your help - the babies are calling me
